column1: Smoque BBQ////Ambiance - needs work. It's dark and uninviting
column2: like they're trying to look low-rent
column3: but it's the wrong fit for this neighborhood. Carry-out Customers hover way too close to the tables because the dining room and waiting area are way too small. Even the soda fountain was broken. If they're this popular
column4: it's way past time to expand.
